sentences.en: "It's not that I don't believe you, Meg," Jack said, unconvincingly.
sentences.cn: “并不是我不相信你，梅格。”杰克口是心非地说道。

sentences.en: Auntie Hilda and Uncle Jack couldn't fuss over them enough.
sentences.cn: 希尔达姨妈和杰克姨父对他们宠爱有加。

sentences.en: Fox stepped forward, welcomed him in Malay, and presented him to Jack.
sentences.cn: 福克斯走向前，用马来语向他表示欢迎，并把他介绍给了杰克。

sentences.en: Jack Aldwych lived in a huge, old two-storeyed house overlooking Harbord.
sentences.cn: 杰克·阿尔德维奇住在一幢可以看见哈博德的巨大的两层旧房子里。

sentences.en: Jack had attended these meetings as a matter of routine for years.
sentences.cn: 数年来，杰克把参加这些会议当成是例行公事。

sentences.en: Jack showed off his latest squeeze at the weekend.
sentences.cn: 周末杰克炫耀了一番自己新交的女朋友。

sentences.en: Jack walked around the hotel and was mesmerized by its sheer size.
sentences.cn: 杰克在宾馆里四处转了转，为其宏伟气势所倾倒。

sentences.en: Jack was a folk hero in the Greenwich Village bars.
sentences.cn: 在格林尼治村的酒吧里杰克是人们心目中的英雄。

sentences.en: Jack would have nothing to do with such capers.
sentences.cn: 杰克不愿扯上这种荒唐的事。

sentences.en: Little Jack was placed with foster parents.
sentences.cn: 小杰克和养父母住在一起。

sentences.en: That was not the life Jack Hewitt planned to live. No way!
sentences.cn: 那不是杰克·休伊特想要的生活，绝对不是！

sentences.en: The coffin had been draped in a Union Jack.
sentences.cn: 灵柩上覆盖着英国国旗。

sentences.en: The leads are Jack Hawkins and Glynis Johns.
sentences.cn: 杰克·霍金斯和格莉妮斯·约翰斯主演。

sentences.en: they're spies, &B{every man jack of them}.
sentences.cn: 他们是间谍，每个人都是。

sentences.en: This guy, Jack Smith, does he go by the name of Jackal?
sentences.cn: 这个叫杰克·史密斯的家伙是不是还有个名字叫杰凯尔？

sentences.en: With one bound Jack was free.
sentences.cn: 杰克纵身一跃就脱身了。

杰克·尼科尔森（奥斯卡金像奖得主）

phrases.phrase: jack of all trades (and master of none)
phrases.tran_cn: 杂而不精的人，三脚猫；万能博士，万金油
(粗俚)手淫
手淫
(北美，非正式)（尤指不公正或优柔寡断的行为）造成（某人）的不便，给（某人）带来麻烦
(英，非正式)放弃（或停止）做某事（尤指工作）
(新西兰，非正式)安排，组织
开膛手杰克（英国伦敦系列凶杀案的凶手绰号）
(澳)放弃；拒绝参与
杰克·韦尔奇（前通用电气董事长兼CEO）；杰克·韦尔奇（美国插图画家）
(英，谐俚)独自，自个儿

英国国旗；联合王国国旗

trans.tran_cn: 千斤顶，[信]插孔，插座，男人，纸牌中的J
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment used to lift a heavy weight off the ground, such as a car, and support it while it is in the air

trans.tran_cn: 增加；提醒；抬起；用千斤顶顶起某物
trans.tran_en: to lift or push (an object) with a jack
